question: Which of the following correctly defines the Mixed economy?
option1: The coexistence of heavy, small scale and cottage industries
option2: The promotion of agriculture as well as cottage industries
option3: The coexistence of rich as well as poor
option4: Co-existence of public as well as private sector
answer: Co-existence of public as well as private sector
explanation: Mixed economy is an economic system in which both the private enterprise and a degree of state monopoly coexist. All modern economies are mixed where the means of production are shared between the private and public sectors. It is also called dual economy.
